ygData.subject: Re: SSS tips
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Red Scales are the only thing that s been confirmed .  There s rumors floating around saying a white scale is the rare drop, but those always include
ygData.messageBody:
> Has it been confirmed that he drops both white and red dragonscales?

Red Scales are the only thing that's been "confirmed". There's
rumors floating around saying a white scale is the rare drop, but
those always include reference to some un-named friend of a relatives
vet who talked to a guy that was in The Hole when another group
killed Nortlav.


> He's said to be L55. Does he fight like VS? And since I've
personally been on no raids on VS, I don't know the tactics used on
him either. If anyone would be able to sneak in some secrets on how
to kill this scalekeeper, or if he does in fact fight like Venril
Sathir, how to defeat him.

Yes, and yes. Heavy Runes and Defensive Disciplines I think are the
most common strategies for Venril. I haven't killed him either, so
maybe someone else can confirm.

> And is it true that the "spawned" or "mini" Trakanon is just L55,
which drops only the guts for our quest? About how many would it
take, and approx Levels to defeat him at this level?

He's the same level and difficulty of the normal Trak. Although,
he's unbuffed (just having spawned and all), you're able to clear his
lair without him being in it, and you can spawn him where you want to
fight him. Those 3 things makes him easier to kill.

He drops a Kunark BP + Trak Guts. You're looking at 30-40 people at
an average level of 55.

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Xegony
